description:
Welcome to 40 Hay Street in the highly desired riverside locale of Old Tewantin. You will love the relaxed ambiance that has been created by the luxe coastal design of this home. Boasting a 837sqm block this property caters for everything the riverside lifestyle offers, catching cool river breezes, areas to relax and unwind, space to entertain family and friends and ample storage room for a boat, caravan, trailer or extra vehicles. All just a short walk to the beautiful Tewantin Village, the Marina and the Noosa River this is your chance to step straight into your new home.

-An abundance of natural light floods the interior of the home and lush green outlooks to the low maintenance tropical gardens creates the calm and homely vibe. Polished concrete floors throughout the lower level

-On the lower level there is a built in daybed with storage set against a northern window, the perfect place to have a cuppa in the morning or a lazy day reading your favourite book. You will also find an office with built in timber desk and large window with garden view

-Stunning kitchen with picture window framing the green foliage of the garden perfectly, gorgeous stone benchtops and soft close cabinetry, large butlers pantry with space for a bar fridge and ample storage

-The downstairs living flows seamlessly to the large covered alfresco area, get ready to entertain with the built in Weber BBQ and preparation area this is sure to be a well utilised area all year round

-Upstairs you will find the spacious bedrooms, media room and bathrooms. The media room can easily become a 4th bedroom, and bedroom 1 & 2 have access to the front verandah. This level also features polished timber floors, plantation shutters and ceiling fans

-The master room is generous in size, custom finishes and opens to the front deck, the ensuite is again generous in size with large walk in shower and bespoke vanity. The master room also has an air conditioning system

-The main bathroom also generous in size has a walk in shower, freestanding bath and bespoke vanity. The laundry downstairs is oversized with great storage solutions, side door to access the clothesline, third toilet, and set behind a feature barn door

-High roofed double carport, plus insulated shed with mezzanine and a large storage area with gates, large backyard with firepit and second BBQ area offering options no matter the time of day or year

-Adventure lovers will appreciate the location with bike riding trails and walking tracks in surrounding areas, access to Noosa River close by for boats and leisure water craft along with the North Shore Ferry which is the gateway to amazing Noosa North Shore, Teewah Village and Double Island Point

- Tewantin Village, Noosa Marina and local primary school are all in walking distance, easy drive to world renowned Noosa Beach and Hastings Street and the restaurants, cafes and shopping of Noosaville
